pages.text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha a l laoh kuchea mcheasa temuoyokt
a l laoh kuchea anak del trauv ke pungpeak
trong minban brasaut botr laey haey trong ka min trauv ke brasaut der
haey kmean norna mneak briebabradauch nung trong laey
chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha khnhom som pi mcheasa krobkrong pel tiebaphlu aoy banhchiesa
ampi brakear akrak teanglay del trong ban bangkeut mk
ning ampi brakear akrak nei peloyb nowpel del pheap ngngut ban mokadl
ning ampi brakear akrak robsa puok sdrei m nd akm del sautr phlom m nd akm tow knong khsaechamnng
haeyning ampi brakear akrak robsa anak chranen chhneanisa nowpel delke chranen chhneanisa
chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha khnhom som pi mcheasa nei mnoussa lok
del chea se d ch krobkrong mnoussa lok
aoy banhchiesa pi brakear akrak nei kar nhouhnhng robsa puok shai t n
del vea nhouhnhng nowknong chetd mnoussa lok
(shai t n noh) mk ampi chin ning mnoussa lok
